SELECT CONTENT_ID , P.RES_NUM, RATING , CONTENT, U.USER_ID,NICKNAME,TO_CHAR(RESERV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS rdatetime FROM POI P INNER JOIN RESERVATION R ON P.RES_NUM = R.RES_NUM INNER JOIN USERS U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE P.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT * FROM POI P INNER JOIN MEDIA M ON P.CONTENT_ID = M.CONTENTID WHERE P.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIA VALUES(MEDIA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{filename}, #{path}, #{contentId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SORT_NO), 0) + 1 FROM MEDIA WHERE CONTENTID = #{contentId}), #{userId}, #{boardNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: UPDATE POI SET RATING = #{rating} ,CONTENT = #{content} WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
